SEARCH
Package org.concordia.macs.State

Class Reinforcement

java.lang.Object
org.concordia.macs.State.Phase
org.concordia.macs.State.Play
org.concordia.macs.State.MainPlay
org.concordia.macs.State.Reinforcement
public class Reinforcement extends MainPlay
Author:
Mahfuzzur Rahman Concrete state representing the game's reinforcement phase. Allows players to deploy armies and proceed to the Attack phase.
